name: Mars Shot (NuttyPlayz)
description:
Hello and welcome to Mars Shot the game that you kill robots and win everyone is a winner we are still in beta so do not judge us yet if you are going to judge us please give us something 4+ stars since this game is not even out yet.

In this game you will shoot a series of different robots and you will also go to each blue point and collect all of the cookies this game is 100% free right now that means when we release the full version we will start charging a few dollars for it so get it now so you do not have to pay latter.
